Giant panda Fu Bao arrives in Chengdu

The chartered flight carrying Fu Bao, the first naturally born panda in South Korea, landed safely on Wednesday in Chengdu, southwest China’s Sichuan Province. After inspection by customs at the airport, Fu Bao was set to be transported to the Shenshuping giant panda base in Wolong National Nature Reserve in Sichuan for quarantine(1).

(1)quarantine /ˈkwɒrəntiːn/ n.检疫;(为防传染的)隔离期;例句：The dog was kept in quarantine for six  months.这条狗被检疫隔离了六个月。

The base is fully prepared to welcome this beloved panda with a range of completed resources and facilities, according to Li Guo, deputy director of the Shenshuping giant panda base under the China Conservation and Research Center for Giant Panda. "We will determine when to make Fu Bao meet the public based on her adaptation. Judging from experiences, the adaptation period can range from one month to eight months, or even longer," said Li.

(2)dub /dʌb/ v.授予称号;例句:London was dubbed 'the insurance capital of the world'.伦敦被称为“世界保险之都”。

(3) mature /məˈtʃʊə(r)/ adj.成熟的;例句：You're saying you need to be with someone more mature.你是说你要跟比较成熟的人在一起。

Fu Bao, dubbed(2) the "top celebrity in South Korea" or "Princess Fu," was born on July 20, 2020, to Le Bao and Ai Bao, the pandas leased by China to South Korea in 2016. She has gained massive popularity across the country and beyond over the years. 

Under the terms of the giant panda research cooperation program, all giant pandas born overseas should be returned to China before turning 4 years old. Giant pandas usually become sexually mature(3) at around 4 years old.

News Abstract

按照大熊猫保护研究合作协议规定，海外新出生的大熊猫幼崽在2岁到4岁返回中国，“福宝”于今年到期回国。据爱宝乐园介绍，“福宝”离开韩国前，前来告别的游客日均千余次。
